text: dūtaru, viśvāsigaḷannu mattu satkarmigaḷannu kattaleyinda horatandu beḷakineḍege munnaḍesalikkāgi, nimage allāhana suspaṣṭa vacanagaḷannu ōdi kēḷisuttāre. Allāhanalli viśvāsaviṭṭu satkarma māḍidavanannu avanu taḷadalli nadigaḷu hariyuttiruva svargōdyānadoḷage sērisuvanu. Avaru sadākāla allē iruvaru. Allāhanu avarige dhārāḷa sampannateyannu nīḍuvanu
